Package img_hole_fill.algos

package img_hole_fill.algos
Algorithms for filling a hole in an image
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    FillHoleAlgo
    An interface for a hole-filling algorithm
    WeightFunction
    An interface for a weighting function used by algorithms to fill a hole in an image
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ApproxAlgo
    Approximating the basic solution in O(n) instead of O(n^2) where n is the number of pixels in the hole
    BaseAlgo
    The base algorithm for filling a hole in an image, works in O(n^2) where n is the number of pixels in the hole
    BoundaryLineSpaceAlgo
    An algorithm for filling a hole in an image in O(nlog(n)) where n is the number of pixels in the hole.
    DefaultWeight
    The default weight function for applying an algorithm for filling a hole in an image
    HolesLineSpaceAlgo
    An algorithm for filling a hole in an image in O(nlog(n)) where n is the number of pixels in the hole.
    LineSpace
    A general template to get log(n) "representatives" in equal distances from each other out of a given set of IntPairs
    RandAlgo
    General template for using randomization for filling a hole in an image using log(n) representatives where n is the number of pixels in the hole to fill.
    RandBoundaryAlgo
    Choosing log(n) (where n is the number of pixels in the hole to fill) representatives from the boundary of the hole and using them to fill the entire hole.
    RandHoleAlgo
    Filling a hole in an image using in nlog(n) where n is the number of pixels in the hole.
    RepresentativesApproach
    A general template for algorithms using representatives pixels in the process of filling a hole in an image
